name: Passing Class
description:
Made in honor of my son who was born during the jam. He's the gassiest creature I've ever witnessed and I thought this was fitting. (He's literally farting right next to me as I'm bouncing him in his bouncer and typing this up.)

Today is one of those gassy school days. Try to get through all 5 of your classes without passing gas.

Controls

  • Spacebar: Pass gas. Holding it longer will relieve gas quicker.
  • E: Interact with certain students and holdable objects.
  • Left Click: Throw held object.
  • Escape: Pause.
